lead_paragraph: Access was restored but a Pakistani court still ordered the government to block content blasphemous to Islam.
snippet: Access was restored but a Pakistani court still ordered the government to block content blasphemous to Islam.

headline.main: Pakistani Court Orders Access to Facebook Restored
headline.print_headline: WORLD BRIEFING | ASIA; Pakistan: Court Orders Facebook Access

byline.original: By ADAM B. ELLICK and WAQAR GILLANI
